list.title: module.exports~extent

list.title: module:_dictionaries
list.description: Module exporting language translations for various languages.

list.title: module:_dictionaries~_dictionaries
list.description:
_dictionaries

  • The mapp.dictionary is an object proxy. The get handler will use the mapp.language (default: en) value to lookup the requested key in the mapp.dictionaries. The English value will be returned if mapp.language entry has not been specified.
  • The mapp.dictionaries object can be extended in any of the javascript modules imported into the mapp library.

list.title: module:layer/decorate
list.description:
layer/decorate

Decorates a layer object with additional properties and methods.

A mapview must be assigned to the layer object in order to decorate a layer.

The layer decorator passes the layer to a defined format method which assigns the Openlayers layer object (L).

Common interface methods such as layer.show, and hide are assigned to the layer object.

A blank layer.filter object will be set if the filter has not been defined in the JSON layer.

The first theme from the layer.style.themes array will be assigned as layer.style.theme if not already set.

Any plugins matching layer keys will be executed with the layer being passed as argument to the plugin method.

The layer object is returned from the decorator.

list.title: module:layer/decorate.geomCurrent
list.description: Returns the current geometry associated with the layer.

list.title: module:layer/decorate.hide
list.description: Hides the layer from the map.

list.title: module:layer/decorate.show
list.description: Shows the layer on the map.

list.title: module:layer/decorate.tableCurrent
list.description: Returns the current table associated with the layer.

list.title: module:layer/decorate.tableMax
list.description: Returns the maximum table associated with the layer.

list.title: module:layer/decorate.tableMin
list.description: Returns the minimum table associated with the layer.

list.title: module:layer/decorate.zoomToExtent
list.description: Zooms to a specific extent on the map.

list.title: module:layer/fade
list.description:
layer/fade

The fade() animation function implements linear interpolation to achieve a smooth transition between opacities on a the cluster layer format. The fade will occur during the zoom in and out as well as changing the view port.

üéØ Target Opacity Calculation:

  • Depending on whether fading in or out, the target opacity is calculated.
  • If fading out, the opacity is reduced by 20% or brought to a minimum of 0.
  • If fading in, the opacity is increased by 20% or limited to a maximum of 1.

‚è±Ô∏è Animation Duration and Timing:

  • The animation duration is set to 100 milliseconds (adjustable), and the start time of the animation is recorded.

üìä Opacity Update Function:

  • The updateOpacity function is used to calculate the current time and elapsed time since the animation started.

üåü Interpolation and Opacity Update:

  • If the elapsed time is less than the animation duration, interpolation is used to smoothly transition the opacity between currentOpacity and targetOpacity.
  • The requestAnimationFrame is used to schedule the next frame of the animation.
  • When the animation duration has elapsed, the layer's opacity is set to the targetOpacity, concluding the animation.

üöÄ Starting the Animation:

  • The animation is triggered by calling the updateOpacity function.

‚è≥ Setting New Timeout:

  • A new fade timeout is set for the next step of the fade animation after the specified duration has passed, ensuring the animation continues until the desired opacity is reached.

list.title: module:layer/fade.fade
list.description: Will Fade the Layer with Interpolation.

list.title: module:layer/featureFields
list.description:
layer/featureFields

  • The featureFormats module has been moved from mapp.utils.featureFormats to mapp.layer.featureFormats to be in line with other mapp.layer modules.
  • The featureFormat methods process layer features for styling.
  • featureFields modules has been added to mapp.layer.
  • Field values are keys within the layer.featureFields{} object.

list.title: module:layer/featureFields.process
list.description: featureFields.process(layer) will process the fields required for a theme and re-render the legend.

list.title: module:layer/featureFields.reset
list.description: featureFields.reset(layer) will reset the layer.featureFields

list.title: module:layer/featureFields~count
list.description: Counts occurrences of values in a field.

list.title: module:layer/featureFields~distribution
list.description: Distribution methods for processing layer data. featureFields.distribution{} methods can be expanded to support different distributions.

list.title: module:layer/featureFields~jenks
list.description:
Jenks natural breaks algorithm for thematic mapping.

  • featureFields.distribution.jenks will process the featureField values array for the theme field to calculate the jenks based on the length of the graduated theme cat_array.
  • The cat values will be updated to represented the natural breaks before the layer and legend are rendered
